name: Darlings at the Edge of the Universe
name_original: Darlings at the Edge of the Universe
description:
On the run from a relentless empire,  two space-faring queers save each other and head off into the cosmos in each other's arms.

Warning: contains discussions of dysphoria,  transphobia, and military violence.

For the Emotions and Feelings Jam: https://itch.io/jam/emotional-jam

Special thanks to @wuwuuspaghetti and Ana Valens for help with writing advice and proofreading .
